definition: esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Feed passes through the esophagus and into a temporary storage organ, the crop.
sentences.chinese: 食料经食道进入一个暂时的贮存器官，即嗉囊。

sentences.english: South Gate Village, 424 Yanggui Yun, M, 50-year-old, esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 南门村424号杨桂云，男，50岁左右，食道癌。

sentences.english: Simon sustained 40% external burns, and also burnt his oesophagus and both lungs.
sentences.chinese: 车辆起火，他外表40%烧伤，食道及肺部皆灼伤。

sentences.english: Oesophagitis is inflammation of the inner lining of the oesophagus caused by repeated episodes of gastro-oesophageal reflux.
sentences.chinese: 胃食管反复逆流致使食道内部上火，从而导致食管炎。

sentences.english: A ring of muscle, the cardiac sphincter, surrounds the esophagus at this point .
sentences.chinese: 此处有一肌肉环即贲门括约肌围绕着食道。

sentences.english: They have two spines and two esophaguses and share other organs.
sentences.chinese: 她们有两个脊椎和食道，其他的器官则共用。

sentences.english: A bone has stuck in my throat.
sentences.chinese: 一根骨头哽住他的食道。

sentences.english: Laceration of the posterior tracheal wall is 1 of the risks of transhiatal esophagectomy (THE).
sentences.chinese: 穿洞式食道切除的危险率是气管后壁的撕裂。

sentences.english: The truth is, doing so increases the risk of oesophagus cancer.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，喜欢吃烫食的人更容易患上食道癌。

sentences.english: Gord . If the damage to the oesophagus leads to inflammation, this is called oesophagitis.
sentences.chinese: 如果损害到食道，导致炎症，这就是所谓的。

sentences.english: The mucosa of oesophagus is multi-layered. There are mucous cells in the mucous membrane.
sentences.chinese: 食道粘膜为复层扁平上皮，粘膜内有粘液细胞。
现在我们的食道萎缩了。

sentences.english: Late oesophageal strictures are usually severe.
sentences.chinese: 最近出现的食道狭窄通常都比较严重。

sentences.english: An important distinction in recognizing megaesophagus is the difference between when a dog regurgitates or vomits.
sentences.chinese: 识别巨食道症的重点在于区分返流和呕吐。

sentences.english: There was on inducement and history of esophagitis or gastritis.
sentences.chinese: 既往没有食道炎和胃炎的病史。

sentences.english: The cricopharyngeal muscle, a component of the inferior constrictor, forms the muscular orifices of the esophagus.
sentences.chinese: 环状咽肌是肌下缩肌中的一个组织，形成食道的肌肉。
